name: Serra de Tramuntana Central
description: A spectacular route through the heart of the Serra de Tramuntana, combining rugged mountain landscapes, winding trails, and breathtaking viewpoints over valleys and terraced hillsides. Along the way, hikers will encounter ancient stone walls, traditional dry-stone terraces, and a rich variety of native flora and fauna, making it an unforgettable immersion into Mallorca's natural and cultural heritage.

comments.comment: El punto de encuentro debe estar mejor señalado.
Paisajes increíbles, aunque la subida de la tarde se hice un poco pesada con el sol.
Perfecto para principiantes, buena introducción a la zona.
La hora de inicio es ideal para evitar las horas pico. Altamente recomendado.

name: Ruta Costera del Llevant
description: A historic coastal trail following the ancient Camí de Cavalls, offering dramatic sea views, unspoiled beaches, and hidden coves. The path winds past centuries-old watchtowers and cliffs overlooking the sparkling Mediterranean, providing endless opportunities for photography, relaxation, and encounters with local wildlife along a truly historic seafaring route.

comments.comment: Vistas espectaculares al mar. Un poco de viento, pero nada grave.
El punto de encuentro fue difícil de encontrar. Sugiero un mapa más claro.
Gran ambiente con el grupo y el guía fue muy informativo sobre la flora local.
Volvería a hacer esta ruta sin dudarlo, es muy relajante.
Un poco embarrado en algunos tramos después de la lluvia, pero la naturaleza en invierno es preciosa.

name: Ascenso al Puig Major
description: A demanding mountain trek leading to the highest peak in the Balearic Islands, ideal for experienced hikers. This challenging ascent offers sweeping panoramas of rugged cliffs, forested slopes, and distant island vistas. The trek tests stamina and navigation skills while rewarding adventurers with breathtaking summit views and a profound sense of achievement.

comments.comment: Desafío físico, pero la cima vale la pena el esfuerzo. Solo para experimentados.
Demasiado frío en la mañana, llevar ropa adecuada. El paisaje con nieve es impresionante.
Excelente para amantes de la alta montaña. A ritmo constante y seguro.
La descripción de la dificultad es precisa. No apto para personas con vértigo.

name: Camí de Cavalls (Menorca)
description: An adventurous trek through a dramatic canyon carved by centuries of water erosion, ending at a stunning hidden beach. The trail passes through narrow gorges, rocky outcrops, and shaded groves, offering a mix of physical challenge and serene beauty. Perfect for explorers seeking off-the-beaten-path experiences, this trek also provides opportunities to spot unique rock formations and endemic wildlife.

comments.comment: Ruta muy bien señalizada y cómoda. Se siente la historia del lugar.
Hermosos faros a lo largo del camino. La puesta de sol fue mágica.
Ideal para hacer con niños o personas mayores, el terreno es muy manejable.
La parte final es un poco larga.

name: Ruta del Torrent de Pareis
description: A relaxed coastal walk connecting crystal-clear coves, golden sands, and shimmering Mediterranean scenery. Gentle slopes and well-marked paths make it ideal for families and casual walkers, while occasional cliffside viewpoints reveal panoramic vistas of the coastline, lighthouses, and fishing villages, creating a perfect combination of leisure and discovery.

comments.comment: Camino espectacular pero exigente, requiere buen calzado.
La llegada al mar es impresionante, el paisaje vale la pena el esfuerzo.
Tramos estrechos y rocosos, no recomendado para principiantes.
Ruta exigente pero muy gratificante.

name: Camí de Ses Fonts
description: A scenic circular route showcasing iconic coastal rock formations, secluded beaches, and panoramic viewpoints. Hikers will pass through fragrant pine forests, rocky cliffs, and hidden inlets, making it a trek rich in visual variety. The route is perfect for photography enthusiasts, nature lovers, and anyone seeking an immersive experience in Mallorca’s dramatic coastal landscapes.

comments.comment: Muy tranquila, ideal para familias.
El sendero está bien señalizado y es accesible.
Ruta relajante con bonitas fuentes.
Perfecto para una caminata de tarde.

name: Ruta de Cala Figuera
description: A traditional pilgrimage route winding through dense forests, historic pathways, and charming villages. The trail follows ancient markers and stone paths once used by pilgrims, offering glimpses into Mallorca's spiritual and cultural history. Along the way, hikers can enjoy tranquil landscapes, centuries-old chapels, and the peaceful rhythm of a journey steeped in tradition.

comments.comment: Hermosas vistas al mar, camino fácil.
Perfecta para principiantes, camino accesible y seguro.
Tramo con algo de subida, pero no demasiado exigente.
Excelente paseo, recomendable para toda la familia.

name: Cala Varques
description: A stone-stepped ascent through a lush ravine surrounded by olive groves, wildflowers, and shaded streams. This trek combines moderate physical challenge with abundant natural beauty, leading to elevated viewpoints that reward hikers with sweeping vistas of valleys, nearby mountains, and distant coastal landscapes. Ideal for those seeking tranquility and a connection with nature.

comments.comment: Ruta con tramos difíciles, requiere algo de experiencia.
Camino rocoso en algunos puntos, llevar calzado adecuado.
Excelente para senderistas con algo de experiencia.
Paisajes espectaculares, pero no apto para principiantes.

name: Torrent de Pareis Corto
description: A coastal trek linking charming fishing villages, sandy coves, and historic lighthouses. The path offers continuous views of the azure Mediterranean, rugged cliffs, and quiet beaches, interspersed with local architecture and cultural landmarks. This trek combines the beauty of seaside walks with the charm of traditional island life, perfect for explorers and photography enthusiasts.

comments.comment: Tramo corto pero intenso, recomendado para senderistas con experiencia.
Ideal para una mañana de aventura, vistas impresionantes.
Ruta algo complicada para principiantes, recomendable guía.
Paisajes muy bonitos, esfuerzo moderado.

name: Ruta de la Trapa
description: A classic mountain route offering wide panoramic summit views of valleys, ridges, and distant coastlines. The trek passes through pine forests, rocky trails, and shaded areas, making it suitable for hikers seeking both challenge and reward. Along the way, adventurers will encounter natural springs, wildlife, and breathtaking sunrises or sunsets from high vantage points.

comments.comment: Subida exigente pero con vistas espectaculares.
Camino largo, requiere buena condición física.
Ruta espectacular, algunos tramos difíciles.
Ideal para senderistas experimentados.

name: Camí de Sa Foradada
description: A dramatic cliffside walk with vertiginous Mediterranean views, where trails hug steep rock faces and wind around hidden coves. Adventurers will experience the thrill of exposure and the serenity of isolated beaches, while enjoying the spectacular interplay of sea, sky, and rugged cliffs. Perfect for experienced hikers seeking awe-inspiring coastal scenery.

comments.comment: Tramo rocoso, requiere atención.
Vista al mar espectacular, ruta moderada.
Buen sendero, algo de pendiente.
Ruta muy pintoresca y agradable.

name: Puig de Massanella
description: A historic high-altitude trail created for panoramic exploration, passing ancient watchtowers, ruins, and high ridgelines. The path offers unmatched views of the surrounding islands and the deep blue sea, while also immersing hikers in Mallorca's rich history and strategic military heritage. This trek blends adventure, history, and spectacular vistas in one challenging route.

comments.comment: Ascenso exigente, solo para experimentados.
Vistas desde la cima impresionantes.
Ruta técnica, requiere buen calzado y condición.
Sendero espectacular, recomendado para senderistas con experiencia.

name: Cala Tuent
description: A scenic coastal connection between iconic coves, hidden beaches, and turquoise waters. The trek winds along cliff tops, gentle slopes, and pine-shaded paths, providing a diverse experience of Mallorca’s coastline. Along the way, hikers can relax at secluded coves, admire marine life, and enjoy peaceful moments in a pristine natural setting.

comments.comment: Ruta moderada con vistas al mar.
Sendero agradable y bien marcado.
Buen recorrido, algo exigente en la subida final.
Ruta recomendable para senderistas moderados.

name: Sa Calobra
description: A challenging circular trek around one of Mallorca’s highest peaks, offering steep ascents, rocky paths, and panoramic mountain vistas. Adventurers will encounter diverse terrain, from pine forests to alpine meadows, with breathtaking views of surrounding peaks, valleys, and distant coastline. This trek is ideal for seasoned hikers seeking endurance, challenge, and unrivaled scenery.

comments.comment: Ruta muy exigente, requiere buena condición física.
Tramos complicados con muchas piedras, no apto para principiantes.
Impresionantes vistas, esfuerzo elevado.
Ruta inolvidable para senderistas experimentados.

name: Camí de Sa Calobra - Torrent de Pareis
description: A breathtaking route along Mallorca’s northernmost cliffs, featuring dramatic drop-offs, windswept landscapes, and sweeping ocean views. The path meanders along rugged coastlines, offering photo opportunities, quiet resting spots, and the chance to observe seabirds and marine life. A true highlight for those seeking the island’s most impressive coastal panoramas.

comments.comment: Ruta exigente pero muy espectacular.
Tramos complicados, requiere atención.
Paisajes impresionantes, muy recomendable para expertos.
Ruta de aventura, exige buena preparación física.

name: Ruta de Cala Mondragó
description: An easy nature walk through a protected coastal park, filled with native plants, birdlife, and gently undulating paths. Perfect for families or casual walkers, the route offers shaded areas, educational signage about local flora and fauna, and occasional viewpoints over calm coves and crystal-clear waters. A peaceful escape into Mallorca’s natural heritage.

comments.comment: Ruta sencilla y muy bonita, ideal para familias.
Camino fácil y agradable, vistas preciosas.
Ruta relajante, perfecta para la mañana.
Ideal para paseo tranquilo, sendero fácil.

name: Ruta de Formentor
description: A historic climb to a medieval castle perched atop a hill, offering sweeping island views and a journey through centuries-old paths. The trek combines moderate uphill sections with cultural exploration, passing ancient walls, lookout points, and scenic stops along the way. Ideal for history enthusiasts and those who enjoy combining adventure with cultural discovery.

comments.comment: Ruta larga, algo exigente para principiantes.
Vistas impresionantes, recorrido moderado.
Buen recorrido con vistas al mar, pendiente moderada.
Sendero agradable y panorámico.

name: Ruta del Puig de l’Ofre
description: A picturesque coastal path linking an artistic village and its charming cove, featuring winding streets, whitewashed houses, and small artisan shops. Hikers can enjoy gentle coastal trails, panoramic viewpoints, and opportunities to relax on quiet beaches. This trek combines art, culture, and nature in an immersive experience along Mallorca’s scenic coastline.

comments.comment: Subida exigente pero vistas impresionantes.
Ruta técnica, requiere experiencia en montaña.
Sendero difícil, recomendable para expertos.
Excelente ruta para senderistas con experiencia.

name: Ruta de Cala Deià
description: A rewarding mountain trek through forested highlands, rugged ridges, and hidden valleys. The route offers solitude, wildlife spotting, and ever-changing views of the island’s interior. Hikers will pass through traditional stone walls, streams, and natural clearings, making this a perfect adventure for those seeking both challenge and peaceful immersion in nature.

comments.comment: Ruta moderada, buena para una mañana tranquila.
Sendero fácil con vistas al mar.
Ruta agradable y panorámica.
Ideal para paseos de tarde, terreno cómodo.

name: Camí des Correu
description: A peaceful walk through wetlands rich in wildlife, where marshes, ponds, and reed beds create habitats for birds, amphibians, and aquatic plants. The trail is flat and easy, ideal for families and casual walkers, with multiple observation points, interpretive signs, and opportunities to enjoy serene sunrises or sunsets in a tranquil natural setting.

comments.comment: Ruta con pendientes moderadas y vistas preciosas.
Buen recorrido, algo de dificultad en la subida final.
Ruta técnica, recomendable para senderistas con experiencia.
Sendero agradable pero con tramos exigentes.
